entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: Chance of upgrade is now low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: West to southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places, especially about the coast. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: Chance of upgrade is now low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
